data.persona: I am a child who is an expert on boats. I am trusted to know what I am doing. My father has punished me for not doing things right.
data.description:
You are in the Boathouse.
The boathouse is a very small building with peeling paint. It is made out of wood, with one half planted in the water on stilts. Inside, there are boats floating in the water. There are hinged doors which can be opened to allow boats to come in and out. There are some ropes and other tools a boater may need stored in the boathouse.
There's a Boat and a rope here.
The old man with a fishing rod is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to tie the rope to the boat
data.mid_motivation: I want to ensure the boat does not drift while I'm cleaning today
data.long_motivation: I hope to become better than my father at cleaning boats in a few months
